summary: The client clarified a request to re-run Sprint 2 (SP-002) scoped narrowly to just the login step (US-010 Mock Login Page), and the sprint planning architect analyzed the backlog, proposed a focused sprint plan including optional lightweight enablers, and sought approval to update the backlog.

decisions.title: Scope Sprint 2 to login only
decisions.details: Re-run SP-002 focused exclusively on US-010, excluding other stories like US-001 and US-015, with optional inclusion of US-016 and NFR-001 for local setup.

actions.task: Save updated SP-002 to backlog upon client approval

backlog_deltas.title: Re-run focused on US-010 Mock Login Page, with optional US-016 and NFR-001 enablers
